.. currentmodule:: apachelogs

Utilities
=========
.. autofunction:: parse_apache_timestamp

Log Format Constants
--------------------
The following standard log formats are available as string constants in this
package so that you don't have to keep typing out the full log format strings:

.. autodata:: COMBINED
.. autodata:: COMBINED_DEBIAN
.. autodata:: COMMON
.. autodata:: COMMON_DEBIAN
.. autodata:: VHOST_COMBINED
.. autodata:: VHOST_COMMON
